channel.title: Construction NoteBook
channel.description: Learn about the latest in Construction Technology!

item.title: How Big Data is Driving Decision-Making in Construction Projects
item.description: Discover how the revolutionary power of Big Data is transforming decision-making processes in the construction industry, leading to smarter, more efficient, and safer projects.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
